channel.title: Quebec on Cooking
channel.description: Recent content in Quebec on Cooking

item.title: Pâté Chinois (Quebec Style Shepherd’s Pie)
item.description: This is the most traditional dish that every household eats in Quebec. As a kid, you would eat Pâté Chinois at least once a week, either at home or at the school’s cafeteria,. It is very similar to a Shepherd’s Pie, as it is divided in 3 layers of ingredients: meat, legumes and mashed potatoes. The literal translation of the name is something like chinese pie. You can search for the origin of the name on the internet, I’m not an history teacher.
